DataElement.preferredName: Surgical Procedure New Diagnosis Stage at Diagnosis Performed Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the indicator related to a diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means executed to recognize the presence of a disease or the extent of cancer spread at the time of the original diagnosis or the reemergence of a malignant neoplasm after a period of remission.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Surgical Procedure New Diagnosis Stage at Diagnosis Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means executed to recognize the presence of a disease or the extent of cancer spread at the time of the original diagnosis.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredName: New Diagnosis Stage at Diagnosis Performed
Property.preferredDefinition:
The unprecedent recognition of the presence of a disease, condition, or injury based on investigation, analysis or tests for signs and symptoms.
:The extent of cancer spread at the time of the original diagnosis.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: The novel recognition of the presence of a disease, condition, or injury based on investigation, analysis or tests for signs and symptoms.
The extent of cancer spread at the time of the original diagnosis.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to GOG for REBOYJ by script Thu Aug 1 14:45:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the indicator related to a new stage diagnosis.

PermissibleValues.value: Not Applicable- No Surgery for Recurrence

A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has it been 8 weeks or less f
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has it been 8 weeks or less from surgery performed for initial diagnosis, staging, and/or cytoreduction, or management of recurrent disease in a chemonaive patient?
